project_abstract.cdata: This Additional Financing will allow the Espirito Santo State Government, connect additional users to the under-utilized trunk sewerage infrastructure, and treatment plants, constructed under the Espirito Santo Water and Coastal Pollution Management Project, and, construct as well, additional sewerage systems in priority areas. Furthermore, water quality will be improved, as will service continuity and service pressure of water supply systems, particularly in the poorer neighborhoods of the Vitoria Metropolitan Region. It will further allow to attain the institutional development objectives as defined at appraisal, while the regulatory environment in which water and sanitation service providers in Espirito Santo operate, will be strengthened. The additional financing will be a Fixed-Spread Loan, to be repaid in 17 years, including 5 years of grace, and, 1 percent will be re-financed under the parent project.
